meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hypermobile.
meanings.sent1: Her hypermobility allowed her to bend her fingers in ways others couldn't.
meanings.sent2: The hypermobility of the gymnast's joints impressed the judges.
meanings.sent3: His hypermobility made him the star of the yoga class.
meanings.sent4: The hypermobility of the contortionist was like watching a human pretzel.
meanings.sent5: The hypermobility of the acrobat made her performance breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Excessive mobility in a joint or joints.
meanings.sent1: The hypermobility in her knee caused frequent dislocations.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that hypermobility in the joints could lead to injuries.
meanings.sent3: The hypermobility in his elbow made him the champion arm wrestler.
meanings.sent4: Her hypermobility in her shoulders was compared to that of a rubber band.
meanings.sent5: The hypermobility in his ankles made him a natural at ballet.
